siteTitle: Clio-X Cultural Heritage and Archives Ecosystem
siteTagline: Building a sustainable and ethical future for digital archives and cultural heritage
copyright: All Rights Reserved Clio-X Â© 2025. Powered by [Gaia-X](https://gaia-x.eu/), [Oasis](https://oasisprotocol.org/) and [Ocean Enterprise](https://www.oceanenterprise.io/). Built by [deltaDAO](https://delta-dao.com).

subItems.name: EuProGigant
subItems.description: Gaia-X Lighthouse EuProGigant is the first funded binational industrial project with the practical implementation of the Gaia-X principles.

subItems.name: GX4FM moveID
subItems.description: Gaia-X Lighthouse Gaia-X 4 Future Mobility aims to develop a decentralized digital mobility identity infrastructure for Europe.

subItems.name: COOPERANTS
subItems.description: Gaia-X Lighthouse COOPERANTS is the collaborative alliance in the Aeronautics and space sector that solves pressing digital collaboration problems by creating a common data space.

subItems.name: ACCURATE
subItems.description: Gaia-X Lighthouse ACCURATE aims to boost the competitiveness of European manufacturing companies with DSS and Manufacturing as a Service frameworks.

subItems.name: Flex4Res
subItems.description: The Flex4Res lighthouse stands for Data spaces for FLEXible production lines and supply chains FOR RESilient manufacturing. Flex4Res develops an open platform for secure and sovereign data exchange

subItems.name: Airbus
subItems.description: For those who make this world a safer place. We pioneer defense and space for their mission success.

subItems.name: Pontus-X Main Portal
subItems.description: With deltaDAO's data and AI Marketplace, you have the freedom to decide how your data and AI services are offered.

subItems.name: AgrospAI
subItems.description: Agri-food Data Space Demonstrator for Sovereign Data-Sharing and Artificial Intelligence Services.

subItems.name: beebucket
subItems.description: The beebucket portal features access to the Extended Dataset Profile Service (EDPS) and Dataset Search Engine (daseen).

subItems.name: Future Engineering Network (FEN)
subItems.description: The Future Engineering Network, a project of Fraunhofer IAO, will focus on the data economy. To help companies explore data-driven business models.

subItems.name: Berlin State Library
subItems.description: Explore the Open Science Ecosystem, a collaboration of libraries, universities, and science pioneers under Gaia-X principles for limitless shared knowledge.

subItems.name: FIWARE
subItems.description: A curated framework of Open Source Platform components to accelerate the development of Smart Solutions.

subItems.name: Polish Agriculture Data Space
subItems.description: An open data space platform for sharing and marketing agri-related datasets guaranteeing data sovereignty.

subItems.name: Open Dataspace Lab
subItems.description: Open Dataspace Lab connects supply and demand for all types of data and AI algorithms.

subItems.name: Car Repair 4.0
subItems.description: Car Repair 4.0 develops a hub infrastructure that connects car workshops to Gaia-X ecosystems and enables AI-supported fault tracking.

subItems.name: Service-Meister
subItems.description: An AI-based Service Ecosystem for Technical Service in the Age of Industry 4.0.
